ie.gmit.computing

类 Second_page

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ie.gmit.computing.Second_page

  • public class Second_page
extends Activity
    It is mainly about buttons display that every time users press one button, it shows its children in the form of buttons. It can also new nodes and deleting nodes to make some changes on the button display and it can set scientists' information through setting.
    作者:
    Siyi_Kong

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int BTN_HEIGHT 
      static int BTN_WIDTH 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Second_page() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add_triggered(View view)
      It is called by the button add
      void delete_triggered(View view)
      It is called by the button delete
      LinearLayout getLinearLayout()
      It creates a new LinearLayout
      void GoToLastLayer(View view)
      It is used to return the last layer that was covered by the present layer
      void onBackPressed()
      The back event is triggered when pressing physical button back
      void onClick(View v)
      It is triggered by buttons on the screen, except the three button Add, delete,setting
      void searchChildren(Node parentNode, Button button)
      To check if it has children and the number of children.
      void setting_triggered(View view)
      It is called by the button setting

    • 方法详细资料

      • onClick

        public void onClick(View v)
        It is triggered by buttons on the screen, except the three button Add, delete,setting

      • searchChildren

        public void searchChildren(Node parentNode,
                  Button button)
        To check if it has children and the number of children. If it is a leaf, jump to another page which would show picture you have taken
        参数:
        parentNode - The node that is going to be searched
        button - the button associated with the parentNode

      • GoToLastLayer

        public void GoToLastLayer(View view)
        It is used to return the last layer that was covered by the present layer
        参数:
        view -

        It is called by the button add

        It is called by the button setting

        public void onBackPressed()
        The back event is triggered when pressing physical button back

        It creates a new LinearLayout
